name: Living A Lie
description:
Living A Lie: A poem I made a few years ago about loving and hiding a painful truth from the person you truly love. 

Disclaimer: Because English is not my native language, I apologize in advance for the grammatical mistakes and typos that you might see in this poem.

If you have any feedback on my work or any other questions, you can reach out to me via these social media channels:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Jakeson.Eudela0327
Discord: JacobFang#4945
Twitter: https://twitter.com/JakesonLloyd
